# init(preferredBlendingMode:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the component.

## Declaration

```swift
init(preferredBlendingMode: EnvironmentBlendingComponent.BlendingMode)
```

## Parameters

- **preferredBlendingMode**: Specifies how the entity and its descendants blend against environments which encompass them.
title: init(preferredBlendingMode:)
